snippet: A hundred-odd revelers on Monday evening ventured to Amos's Southend, a warehouse of a club in the Southend section of town, for a party hosted by StartUp RockOn featuring a performance by the Roots and Allen Stone.
abstract: A hundred-odd revelers on Monday evening ventured to Amos's Southend, a warehouse of a club in the Southend section of town, for a party hosted by StartUp RockOn featuring a performance by the Roots and Allen Stone.

headline.main: In Charlotte, Conventiongoers Find Inspiration After Hours
